overview: Documentary Film by Cengiz Özkarabekir. 3 Hürel episodes of the "Alone" Documentary series... The legendary band of Turkish music history, 3 Hürel only made music in the 1970s. But no musician, no band has been able to fit so much success in such a short time. They are a band that deserves to be legendary. He is our idol...
title: 3 Hürel Documentaries
